group_1.textRight: Pardon me, Ao.

group_1.textLeft: One sec~ @Don't talk to me right now~

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry.
We need to talk, though. I am glad that you @finally decided to come here, but...

group_1.textLeft: Hell yeah, here it comes~
You may fall prey to my battle axe~!

group_1.textRight: I wasn't expecting you to bring your own video @games and ask to use my TV...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Reward get~

group_1.textRight: ...and then spend all of your time playing games @as if this is your own house.
I must prepare for tomorrow's meeting, so it would @be great if you could at least turn it down a little...

group_1.textLeft: Tehe~
It's okay, I'm done now.

group_1.textRight: You are?

group_1.textLeft: There's this boss you can only fight during a certain time of day.
But my parents don't like me playing games, so I @had to escape my house and do it here~

group_1.textRight: I just realized your character uses the same weapon @as you, Ao.

group_1.textLeft: No, I use the same weapon as my character.
Because she's my other self. The me who can fight.

group_1.textRight: What was that noise?

group_1.textLeft: An in-game message.
You can talk to other players like this~

group_1.textRight: Is it like a chatroom or something?

group_1.textLeft: Mm, well, this was a direct message.
So only I can read it.
*Gasp*?!
"randios"...

group_1.textRight: Is that the enemy in the game...?

group_1.textLeft: Not in the game, in real life. It's Ranka Chizu.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102103:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]â€”?!

group_1.textLeft: She always shows up at this time for the boss,
so I was gonna try contacting her,
but she beat me to it.

group_1.textRight: So that's why you've been playin' games here @all the time, huh!

group_1.textLeft: Pretty much...

group_1.narration: randios @i knew you'd show up here if you were @really coming after me.
blue_axe @Despite seeing you in real life so many times, @I couldn't catch you. But in this game, @you can talk to anyone as long as you know @their player name.
randios @you can thank me for not blocking you. @it's hard to believe you didn't block me either tbh.
blue_axe @Why would I get rid of a way to contact the person @I want to kill?
blue_axe @So, why are you sending me a message? @You want to poke fun at me and tick me off? @Or do you want me to come kill you?
randios @the second one, i guess. i wanna talk to you in person.
blue_axe @I couldn't ask for anything better.
randios @it's settled, then. @meet me tomorrow night at janomiya's base. @i'll be there on my own, @but you can bring friends if you want.

group_1.textRight: Ao, are you going alone?

group_1.textLeft: She's obviously up to something. You had better @take someone with you.

group_1.textRight: Maybe the other Janomiya girls...?

group_1.textLeft: No, this is partly a personal thing, @so I'm going solo tomorrow~.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!

group_1.textLeft: It's Hard Mode, after all~

group_1.textRight: You should take this more seriously...!

group_1.textLeft: Then why don't you come with me, Hikaru?
Just you would be more than enough.

group_1.textRight: But I've got a meeting to go to with Yuna tomorrow...

group_1.textLeft: I'm gonna step outside for some fresh air~
...You go with her, Hikaru.

group_1.textRight: ...Are you sure I don't need to go with you...?

group_1.textLeft: I'm more worried about Ao.
She seems like she's on thin ice right now,
so I want you to keep an eye on her.
Plus, it would be better not to have the @Horse of Torayamachi show up at the meeting.

group_1.textRight: ...I understand.
Just please be careful.
